verses.verse: And<WG2532> after<WG3326> these things<WG5023> I saw<WG1492> four<WG5064> angels<WG32> standing<WG2476> on<WG1909> the four<WG5064> corners<WG1137> of the earth<WG1093>, holding<WG2902> the four<WG5064> winds<WG417> of the earth<WG1093>, that<WG2443> the wind<WG417> should not<WG3361> blow<WG4154> on<WG1909> the earth<WG1093>, nor<WG3383> on<WG1909> the sea<WG2281>, nor<WG3383> on<WG1909> any<WG3956> tree<WG1186>.

And<WG2532> I saw<WG1492> another<WG243> angel<WG32> ascending<WG305> from<WG575> the east<WG395>, <WG2246> having<WG2192> the seal<WG4973> of the living<WG2198> God<WG2316>: and<WG2532> he cried<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice<WG5456> to the four<WG5064> angels<WG32>, to whom<WG3739> it<WG846> was given<WG1325> to hurt<WG91> the earth<WG1093> and<WG2532> the sea<WG2281>,

Saying<WG3004>, Hurt<WG91> not<WG3361> the earth<WG1093>, neither<WG3383> the sea<WG2281>, nor<WG3383> the trees<WG1186>, until<WG891><WG99999> we have sealed<WG4972> the servants<WG1401> of our<WG2257> God<WG2316> in<WG1909> their<WG846> foreheads<WG3359>.

And<WG2532> I heard<WG191> the number<WG706> of them<WG3588> which were sealed<WG4972>: and there were sealed<WG4972> a hundred<WG1540> and forty<WG5062> and four<WG5064> thousand<WG5505> of<WG1537> all<WG3956> the tribes<WG5443> of the sons<WG5207> of Israel<WG2474>.

Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Judah<WG2448> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand<WG5505>. Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Reuben<WG4502> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand<WG5505>. Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Gad<WG1045> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand<WG5505>.

Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Aser<WG768> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand<WG5505>. Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Nepthalim<WG3508> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand<WG5505>. Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Manasses<WG3128> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand<WG5505>.

Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Simeon<WG4826> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand<WG5505>. Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Levi<WG3017> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand<WG5505>. Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Issachar<WG2466> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand<WG5505>.

Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Zebulun<WG2194> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand<WG5505>. Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Joseph<WG2501> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand<WG5505>. Of<WG1537> the tribe<WG5443> of Benjamin<WG958> were sealed<WG4972> twelve<WG1427> thousand<WG5505>.

After<WG3326> this<WG5023> I looked<WG1492>, and<WG2532>, behold<WG2400>, a great<WG4183> multitude<WG3793>, which<WG3739> no<WG3762> man<WG846> could<WG1410> number<WG705>, of<WG1537> all<WG3956> nations<WG1484>, and<WG2532> kindreds<WG5443>, and<WG2532> people<WG2992>, and<WG2532> tongues<WG1100>, stood<WG2476> before<WG1799> the throne<WG2362>, and<WG2532> before<WG1799> the Lamb<WG721>, clothed<WG4016> with white<WG3022> robes<WG4749>, and<WG2532> palms<WG5404> in<WG1722> their<WG846> hands<WG5495>;

And<WG2532> cried<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice<WG5456>, saying<WG3004>, Salvation<WG4991> to our<WG2257> God<WG2316> which<WG3588> sits<WG2521> upon<WG1909> the throne<WG2362>, and<WG2532> to the Lamb<WG721>.

And<WG2532> all<WG3956> the angels<WG32> stood<WG2476> round about<WG2945> the throne<WG2362>, and<WG2532> about the elders<WG4245> and<WG2532> the four<WG5064> creatures<WG2226>, and<WG2532> fell<WG4098> before<WG1799> the throne<WG2362> on<WG1909> their<WG846> faces<WG4383>, and<WG2532> worshiped<WG4352> God<WG2316>,

Saying<WG3004>, Amen<WG281>: Blessing<WG2129>, and<WG2532> glory<WG1391>, and<WG2532> wisdom<WG4678>, and<WG2532> thanksgiving<WG2169>, and<WG2532> honor<WG5092>, and<WG2532> power<WG1411>, and<WG2532> might<WG2479>, be to our<WG2257> God<WG2316> for<WG1519> ever<WG165> and ever<WG165>. Amen<WG281>.

And<WG2532> one<WG1520> of<WG1537> the elders<WG4245> answered<WG611>, saying<WG3004> to me<WG3427>, Who are these<WG3778> which<WG5101> are<WG1526> arrayed<WG4016> in white<WG3022> robes<WG4749>? And<WG2532> from where came<WG2064> they<WG4159>?

And<WG2532> I said<WG2046> to him<WG846>, Sir<WG2962>, you<WG4771> know<WG1492>. And<WG2532> he said<WG2036> to me<WG3427>, These<WG3778> are<WG1526> they which came<WG2064> out<WG1537> of great<WG3173> tribulation<WG2347>, and<WG2532> have washed<WG4150> their<WG846> robes<WG4749>, and<WG2532> made<WG3021> them<WG846> white<WG3021> in<WG1722> the blood<WG129> of the Lamb<WG4749>.

Therefore<WG1223><WG99999> are they<WG1526> before<WG1799> the throne<WG2362> of God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> serve<WG3000> him<WG846> day<WG2250> and<WG2532> night<WG3571> in<WG1722> his<WG846> temple<WG3485>: and<WG2532> he<WG3588> that sits<WG2521> on<WG1909> the throne<WG2362> shall live<WG4637> among<WG1909> them<WG846>.

They shall hunger<WG3983> no<WG3756> more<WG2089>, neither<WG3761> thirst<WG1372> any<WG3361> more<WG2089>; neither<WG3761> shall the sun<WG2246> light<WG4098> on<WG1909> them<WG846>, nor<WG3761> any<WG3956> heat<WG2738>.

For<WG3754> the Lamb<WG721> which<WG3588> is in<WG303> the midst<WG3319> of the throne<WG2362> shall feed<WG4165> them<WG846>, and<WG2532> shall lead<WG3594> them<WG846> to<WG1909> living<WG2198> fountains<WG4077> of waters<WG5204>: and<WG2532> God<WG2316> shall wipe away<WG1813> all<WG3956> tears<WG1144> from<WG575> their<WG846> eyes<WG3788>.
